text:
hello folks, just run across a problem whilst trying to upgrade ember to the latest version (coming from 2.3.x). I’ve got as far as 2.8.x and discovered that a view called application.js no longer applies a `className` to the first `div` in the dom…which is a problem because I really need to set 100% height on it. I see it has been discussed at length here:
<https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js/issues/11486>

but just wondering if anyone has any other suggestions or any tips on how to handle this one? thanks in advance!

I just target `body > .ember-view` and that's it
